ygData.subject: Re: Ak'Anon king
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a character who is always camped inside the palace and has been there since the beginning of release. Whenever I sign on, which is to go buy things and
ygData.messageBody:
I have a character who is always camped inside the palace and has been there
since the beginning of release. Whenever I sign on, which is to go buy
things and log inside the palace again (tinkering items), I always have seen
the king being a small human. I went in game and had a lvl 50 enchanter
dispell the king. Nothing happenned. This GM is right. I'm tired of
following Gazamel's roads to nowhere. -El Fin-

Raskur Everheart, level 50 Gnome


----- Original Message -----
From: James Adams <jwa@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 3:37 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Ak'Anon king


> From: James Adams <jwa@...>
>
> Ever since retail release I have been wondering about this and bugging
> gms for an explanation. I can not remember a time when Akanon was not a
> SMALL human. The only guide to give any explanation said (opinion only,
> he/she remembered him being a small human since retail as well) that
> maybe Verant was waiting for something worthy of a King...Who knows.
> Someone I know went in and killed him once, so I'll ask him what Akanon
> repoped as...
>
> Phizn
> Mith Marr
>
> PS A dark elf once told me that Akanon is really a brownie that has all
> us gnomes fooled...scary thought!
>
